Class SensorController

java.lang.Object
com.laundry.laundryMgmt.controllers.SensorController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173", maxAge=3600L) @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/sensors") public class SensorController extends Object

      Retrieves a sensor by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the sensor to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The SensorEntity object if found, otherwise null.

    • create

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SensorEntity> create(@RequestBody SensorRecord sensor)
      Creates a new sensor.
      Parameters:
      sensor - The SensorRecord object representing the sensor to be created.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the created SensorEntity object.

    • update

      @PutMapping(path="/{id}/status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SensorEntity> update(@PathVariable Long id)
      Updates the status of a sensor by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the sensor to update.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the updated SensorEntity object if successful, otherwise a bad request.

    • updateMeasure

      @PutMapping(path="/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SensorEntity> updateMeasure(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody SensorRecord sensor)
      Updates the measure of a sensor by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the sensor to update.
      Returns:
      The ResponseEntity containing the updated SensorEntity object if successful, otherwise a bad request.

      Deletes a sensor by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the sensor to delete.

    • findAllSensorTypes

      @GetMapping("/types") public List<SensorType> findAllSensorTypes()
      Retrieves all available sensor types.
      Returns:
